articles.title: ‘Lord Of The Rings’ director Peter Jackson pays tribute to Ian Holm: “Farewell, dear Bilbo” - NME
articles.description: 'Lord Of The Rings' director Peter Jackson has paid tribute to Ian Holm, who starred as Bilbo Baggins in the movies, calling him "a kind, generous man".
articles.content:
Lord Of The Rings director Peter Jackson has paid an emotional tribute to the late Ian Holm.
Holm, who starred as Bilbo Baggins in the trilogy of films, passed away this week at the age of 88.

articles.title: Trisha Goddard says Ant and Dec's bosses should have stopped blackface skit - Mirror Online
articles.description: Trisha Goddard has slammed Ant and Dec's decision to film a skit in blackface on Saturday Night Takeaway and insists they should have been stopped
articles.content:
Trisha Goddard has insisted Ant McPartlin and Declan Donnelly's bosses should stepped in and stopped them from wearing blackface on Saturday Night Takeaway.

articles.author: Sky
articles.title: Black Parade: Beyonce drops surprise new track and launches directory of black-owned businesses - Sky News
articles.description: The influential artist launched a project providing an online directory of businesses owned by black people.
